Overview Examples API Source

API Reference

Tooltip

Tooltips

  • tnt.tooltip : creates a new tooltip instance
  • tooltip.position : sets the relative position of the tooltip with respect to the mouse
  • tooltip.allow_drag : sets if the tooltip is draggable or not
  • tooltip.show_closer : sets if the tooltip can be closed manually
  • tooltip.width : sets the minimum width of the tooltip
  • tooltip.id : sets an id for the tooltip
  • tooltip.fill : specifies how to render the tooltip content
  • tnt.tooltip.plain : tooltips for non-structured data
  • tnt.tooltip.table : tooltip rendered as a table
